Event.name: Product_development_scenario
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fex name="Dev">Developer</fex> works to create progress on an <fen>Entity</fen>. The <fen>Entity</fen> typically goes through three stages of development: the conceptual process (Achieving_first); the development process (Product_development); and the manufactuing process (Manufacturing). The Entity can also undergo additional processes such as designing, engineering, prototyping, and testing.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Developer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Developer</fen> is the person who develops the <fen>Entity</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> is the item developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Entity</fen> is developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Company
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The organization for which the <fen>Entity</fen> is developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
</def-root>
